blogs.title: I wish I was in New Orleans
blogs.body: Well, I wish I was in New Orleans. I can see it in my dreams. Arm-in-arm down Burgundy, a bottle and my friends and me.
blogs.author: Tom

blogs.title: Sweet Home New Orleans
blogs.body: Sweet Home New Orleans. I can sure 'nuff hear you calling. Feel that gentle rain be falling. Say 'Where y'at, my darling'.
blogs.author: Dr. John

blogs.title: Zydeco sont pas sale
blogs.body: T'as volé mon gilet, T'as volé mon chapeau, Garde hip et taïaut, Les haricots sont pas salés.
blogs.author: Monsieur Chenier

blogs.title: A Little Something Extra
blogs.body: Red beans are rice are so very nice!
blogs.author: Queen LaStesha

blogs.title: I Love Nola Boy
blogs.body: Oh cute Nola Boy who gives tours and is a SNACKIN' CAKE! I love you. Every 'y'all' adds a year to my life IS2G!
blogs.author: Queen LaStesha
